title: Cleric
content: Aberration, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you. 10 Turns Concentration DESTRUCTIVE WAVE Lv 5 Evocation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot 10 - 60 Damage 5d6Thunder + 5d6Radiant damage. Create a shockwave of either divine or malevolent thunder that damages nearby creatures and possibly knocks them Prone. 1 Turn On Save: Targets still take half damage 9m CON Save DOMINATE PERSON Lv 5 Enchantment Action Make a humanoid fight alongside you.Every time
